The BXT-100 is a Bluetooth to AV IR Extender , which is solely developed by Remotec Technology Ltd. It works with any Android Smart Phones and Tablet by connecting Bluetooth control signals to AV IR control code. End user can set the IR code on any Smart Devices and transmit IR commands by each Extender. The IR code library supports almost every popular brand found in today's market and it is upgradeable which the users can download from Google Play Application.
